txt.en: You've chosen to share a quest with your group. When you share a quest, anyone in your group who does not have the quest and meets the requirements is given the choice to accept the quest.\n\nIf the quest is one in a chain of quests, your group members can accept the quest to receive the earliest quest in the chain for which they are eligible.

You've chosen to share a quest with your group. When you share a quest, anyone in your group who does not have the quest and meets the requirements is given the choice to accept the quest.\n\nIf the quest is one in a chain of quests, your group members can accept the quest to receive the earliest quest in the chain for which they are eligible.

You've chosen to share a quest with your fellowship. When you share a quest, anyone in your fellowship who does not have the quest and meets the requirements is given the choice to accept the quest.\n\nIf the quest is one in a chain of quests, your fellow can accept the quest to receive the earliest quest in the chain for which they are eligible.

When you share a quest, anyone in your fellowship who does not have the quest and meets the requirements is given the choice to accept the quest.\n\nIf the quest is one in a chain of quests, your fellow can accept the quest to receive the earliest quest in the chain for which they are eligible.
